alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued July 12 at 9:24PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Warning is in effect... * WHAT...Surfs of 15 to 18 feet will impact south and east facing shores due to a large southerly swell and strong tradewinds. * WHERE...All Islands of American Samoa. * WHEN...through Friday. * HIGH SRUF WARNING IMPACTS...Expect ocean water occasionally sweeping across portions of beaches, very strong breaking waves, and strong longshore and rip currents. Breaking waves may occasionally impact harbors, making navigating the harbor channel dangerous. HIGH SURF WARNING PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Large, breaking surf, significant shorebreak, and dangerous currents make entering the water very hazardous. Anyone entering the water could face significant injury or death. && Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 924 PO ASO LUA IULAI 12 2022 ...Ua iai nei le Lapataiga mo Galu maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu e 15 i le 18 futu le maualuluga o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e ona o a`uma tetele mai saute fa`apea le agi malosi o le tuaoloa. * NOFOAGA...mo motu uma o Amerika Samoa * TAIMI...seia oo i le Aso Faraile... * AAFIAGA O LE LAPATAIGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA...Tulaga maualuga. E matua malolosi le fafati o galu faapea le aave o le sami. O galu maualuluga e ono aafia ai uafu laiti, ma faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA MO LAPATAIGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA... O galu maualuluga ma le malosi o le aave o le sami e ono aafia ai le soifuaga o le tagata. Faamolemole, ia faautagia nei lapataiga mo lou saogalemu.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
